full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### **MRB ECs Installation Cranes**
#### ** Call for Bids ID: W8472-245921/A**

**Government of Canada NOTICE TO BIDDERS**

**Bid Date:** April 10, 2024 at 16:00 hrs

**Publish Date:** March 20, 2024

**Project Description:**

This non-recurring procurement is for the delivery of materials to be used for the installation of cranes (ECs) at the MRB capital project. Details of the line items can be found in Annex A.

### Synopsis
* **Contract Type:** Goods Procurement
* **Bidding Method:** Competitive - Traditional
* **Line of Service:** *Electrical switches and accessories, Cooling equipment and parts and accessories
* **Trade Agreements:** *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** *Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** *Halifax, *Canada

### IMPORTANT NOTICE
*   This bid opportunity has been cancelled.
*   Bidders are required to abide by the terms and conditions specified in the bidding document.

### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority:** The Department of National Defence
*   **Contact Person:** Nadine Baril
*   **Email:** [nadine.baril@forces.gc.ca](mailto:nadine.baril@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** +(613) 862-7297

### Bid Submission Requirements
*   **Bid Period:** April 10, 2024 at 16:00 hrs
*   **Bid Documents:** Available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

### Supporting Documents
*   [Bid notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31492/w8472-245921_a_rfp-mrb-ecs-install-cranes-eng.pdf)
*   [Bid announcement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31492/w8472-245921_a_rfp-mrb-ecs-install-cranes-amend003-bilingual.pdf)

### Attachment Repository
*   Available at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

We reserve the right to cancel bids. In
